cause.description:
Devil Worshiping Is Was Different Than Satanism; In Satanism, Satanic Individuals Dont Worship The Devil Or Satan, The Name Isn't Related To Satan In Any Kind. Satanism: Meaning: Comes From The Hebrew World Of Being Strong. Satanic Individuals Don't Believe In Satan At All Neither God In Belief, Yet, They Are Considered As A Path Of The Catholic Church Without Believing In God. Any Satanist Will Be Having A Funeral At A Catholic Church. The Founder Of Satanism (Anton Zsandor LaVey) On His Death Bed Believed In Christ And God.
1. Belifs Are Different Than Religious Point Of Views.
cause.name: Stop Relating Devil Worshiping To Satanism
